welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fairview Shores, a charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orlando Executive Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Orlando Executive Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orlando International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Orlando International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Orlando International Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a sign-in process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orlando Sanford International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at Orlando Sanford International Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
